# 塔罗入门

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/taluo-rumen
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/taluo-rumen
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install taluo-rumen
taluo-rumen <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g taluo-rumen
taluo-rumen <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
